hero.title: The most comprehensive urban legends database
hero.description: Access thousands of urban legends, myths, and folklore stories from around the world. A professional REST API built for developers, researchers, and storytellers.

overview.title: API Overview
overview.description: Access comprehensive data about Urban Legends through our RESTful API endpoints.

items.title: Urban Legends

items.title: Regions
items.description: Browse legends by region and explore their unique cultural origins.

items.title: Categories
items.description: Explore legends organized by category for easier navigation and discovery.

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.description: Start exploring urban legends in minutes with our powerful and easy-to-use RESTful API.
